title: OXO Grape & Tomato Cutter
description:
For additional information on the featured product please visit: http://www.surlatable.com/product/PRO-1669522/OXO+Grape+and+Tomato+Cutter

Perfect for salsa, fruit salad, sangria and more, this innovative gadget slices grapes, cherry tomatoes or other small, soft fruits into ready-to-use quarters with a simple, one-handed motion. Ultra-sharp serrated blades easily slice through soft fruit skins, while the curved finger rests provide comfort even during prolonged use. Cutter disassembles for easy cleaning and snaps onto the included case for safe storage. 

For more about Sur La Table, visit www.surlatable.com

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] At OXO, we're all about making everyday living easier. And if you've ever tried to slice a grape or a grape tomato, you'll know that these little fruits can be very difficult to tackle. Take the hassle out of quartering small fruits with the OXO Grape and Tomato Cutter. 

Sharp, serrated stainless steel blades quickly and easily slice through the soft fruit skin while keeping fingers safe and out of the way. While ideal for grapes, the blades can also cut through pitted olives and small grape tomatoes. The curved finger rests provide comfort even during repetitive use. 

The Grape and Tomato Cutter is great for making chicken salad, sangria, fruit salad, salsa, and more. The cover snaps on for safe storage. And the Grape and Tomato Cutter is top-rack dishwasher safe. 

Here's a good tip. If you want to take your grape cutter apart for deep cleaning, simply unscrew the top and bottom pieces, press in the green plunger, unscrew the plunger cap, remove the spring and the plunger. All pieces except for the spring are top-rack dishwasher safe. To reassemble, insert the plunger back into the top of the grape cutter, put the screw on, screw the plunger shaft and cap together, and put the top and bottom back together.
